155-145 East 28th Street, north side, west of Third Avenue. In the centre is St. Stephen's Church (Roman Catholic), and to
the left its parochial school.
April 24, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

NEG.#4491

711876f-a.text:
208-214 E. 28th Street, south side, east of Third Avenue, showing a children's playground (constructed and operated by the W. P. A.) on a site where abandoned buildings formerly stood.
Thru the cooperation of the various civic, federal authorities and the property owner this play area stands, accessible for sale by the owner, and absent of the fire and health hazards that were present before. Buildings in the background are on E. 27th Street;
Third Avenue being on the right and not seen.
1938

gift of Committee on Housing
Charity Organization Society

In December of 1939, a modern six story apartment house
is being constructed on this site.
